contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Company |name = Québecor Media Inc. |company_logo = [[Image:Quebecor_media.png|200px]] |type = [[Public company|Subsidiary of public company]] |foundation = 2000 |location_city = [[Montreal|Montreal, Quebec]] |location_country = [[Canada]] |key_people = [[Pierre Karl Péladeau]], <small>[[President]] and [[Chief executive officer|CEO]]</small> |area_served = |industry = Diversified media and [[broadcasting]] |products = [[Cable television]] <br /> [[Newspapers]] <br /> [[Broadcasting]] |services = [[Broadcasting]] <br /> [[Filmmaking|Film production]] <br /> [[Publishing]] |parent = [[Quebecor|Quebecor Inc.]]<br>CDP Capital d’Amérique Investissements Inc. |divisions = [[Osprey Media]] <br /> [[Sun Media]] <br /> [[TVA Group]] <br /> [[Vidéotron]] |subsid = |slogan = |homepage =[http://www.quebecor.com/ www.quebecor.com] }} '''Québecor Media Inc.''' is a [[Canada|Canadian]] media company. [[Quebecor|Québecor Inc.]] owns the [[controlling interest]] with 54.72% while CDP Capital d’Amérique Investissements Inc. (a subsidiary of [[Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec]], the provincial pension fund) owns the remaining 45.28%.<ref>http://crtc.gc.ca/ownership/cht156.pdf</ref> ==Assets== {{main|Quebecor}} ==Corporate governance== '''Board of directors:'''<ref>http://quebecor.com/en/content/board-directors-quebecor-media</ref> *Serge Gouin -- Chairman *André Delisle *Jean La Couture *A. Michel Lavigne *Samuel Minzberg *[[Brian Mulroney]] *[[Pierre Karl Péladeau]] -- President, CEO and President and CEO of Quebecor Inc., Sun Media Corporation *Normand Provost ==See also== {{Portalbox|Montreal|Companies}} * [[Torstar]] ** [[Metroland Media Group]] ** [[Star Media Group]] * [[Postmedia Network]] *[[The Woodbridge Company]] and [[CTVglobemedia]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.quebecor.com/ Official Quebecor Media Inc. website] * [http://www.crtc.gc.ca/ownership/cht156a.pdf CRTC chart of Quebecor Media Inc.'s assets] (PDF) {{Quebecor Inc.}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quebecor Media}} [[Category:Quebecor]] [[Category:Newspaper companies of Canada]] [[Category:Companies based in Montreal]]
